0.text: Innate- Final Service: Yorick raises a grave for every enemy  champion, large  monster and 12th / 6th / 2nd (based on level) non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with  Last Rites. Up to 4 graves can exist at once, with the furthest ones being replaced by the newest.

1.text: Yorick can use  Awakening and  Mourning Mist's mark to raise a Mist Walker from each grave.

2.text: Innate - The Cursed Horde: Up to 4 Mist Walkers can be active at once, with the closest ones being replaced by the newest.

3.text: See Pets for more details about Mist Walkers.

0.text: Active: Yorick's next basic attack within 5 seconds is empowered to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and  heal him for 10 − 68 (based on level). The heal is doubled to 20 − 136 (based on level) if he is below 50% maximum health.

1.text: While there are at least 3 graves nearby and Last Rites is active or on  cooldown, Yorick can cast  Awakening.

2.text: Last Rites  resets Yorick's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Yorick exhumes a Mist Walker under his command from each nearby grave.

Active: Yorick summons a ring of spirits around the target location that arises after a 0.75-second delay,  knocking aside enemies hit over 0.25 seconds, though not through terrain. Within 210-units, they are pulled inside; otherwise they are pushed away. The ring remains for 4 seconds as impassible terrain against enemies, granting  sight inside the ring.

1.text: Dark Procession can only be targeted by enemy  champion basic attacks and  turrets. The wall takes 1 damage per attack from champions and is destroyed instantly from turret attacks.

0.text: Active: Yorick hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an area at the target location, dealing 15% of target's current health magic damage to enemies hit, down to a minimum threshold.

1.text: Enemy  champions and  monsters hit are  slowed by 30% for 2 seconds, and marked Cursed for 4 seconds. Cursed  champions are also  revealed.

2.text:
Cursed: The target takes 40% bonus damage from 8 attacks by Mist Walkers and continually raises a Mist Walker from each nearby grave, up to a maximum of 4.
Yorick, Mist Walkers and the  The Maiden gain  20% bonus movement speed toward nearby Cursed enemies. Mist Walkers will  leap to nearby Cursed enemy champions and large monsters, dealing  100% of their AD upon arrival.

3.text: Mourning Mist will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist surrounded by a number of Mist Walkers at the target location, which remain on the battlefield until she or Yorick dies. Eulogy of the Isles can be recast once while the Maiden is alive after 10 seconds of the activation.

1.text: Recast: Yorick sets the Maiden free, allowing her to push the nearest lane until she dies.

2.text: See Pets for more details about The Maiden of the Mist. Eulogy of the Isles will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Innate- Final Service: Yorick raises a grave for every enemy  champion, large  monster and 12th / 6th / 2nd (based on level) non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with  Last Rites. consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • trinket

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for 81.25% base AD (+ ( 3.9% / 1.95%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3% armor penetration, and 3% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for 81.25% base AD (+ ( 3.9% /  1.95%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Boarding Party: While no allied champions are within 1400 units, gain ( 10 − 75 / 5 − 37.5) (based on level) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance and 20% bonus basic damage against structures. Nearby allied siege minions and super minions gain ( 30 − 225 / 15 − 112.5) (based on level) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, 10% bonus size and deal 200% bonus damage against structures. Bonus resistances are lost instantly when an allied champion is nearby.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BOARDING PARTY: While no allied champions are within  1400 units, gain ( 10 − 75 /  5 − 37.5) (based on level) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance and 20% bonus  basic damage against structures. Nearby allied  siege minions and  super minions gain ( 30 − 225 /  15 − 112.5) (based on level) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, 10% bonus size and deal 200% bonus damage against structures. Bonus resistances are lost instantly when an allied champion is nearby.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Colossus: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 2% of bonus health.
Unique – Cleave: Basic attacks on-hit deal ( 4 / 3) (+ ( 1.5% / 1.125%) maximum health) bonus physical damage to the target and ( 40 / 30) (+ ( 3% / 2.25%) maximum health) physical damage to other enemies in a cone in the direction of the target.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – COLOSSUS: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 2% of bonus health.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – The Claws that Catch: Gain 45% base AD as bonus attack damage.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – THE CLAWS THAT CATCH: Gain 45% base AD as bonus attack damage.

Active: Yorick's next basic attack within 5 seconds is empowered to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and  heal him for 10 − 68 (based on level). The heal is doubled to 20 − 136 (based on level) if he is below 50% maximum health.
